moduleMetadataJson.name: Open a file or URL on the target computer
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module will open any file or URL specified with the URI format on the
        target computer via the embedded commands such as 'open' or 'xdg-open'.
author: Eliott Teissonniere

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.
